item.title: [Erasedpkz]NEED INT CONVERTER[erasedpkz]
item.dc:creator: @oxygen1 oxygen-_
item.description:
@oxygen1 wrote:

I think someone should make an int converter or renamer that puts delta to erasedpkz, hybridpvp, or something int that nature. I garuntee they would be VERY appreciated. Anyways, Could someone give me the format for the itemdef.java in an erasedpkz source?

Here’s what mine looks like:

case 13360: itemDef.modelid = 62701; itemDef.name = "Torva platelegs"; itemDef.description = "Torva platelegs."; itemDef.modelZoom = 1740; itemDef.modelRotationY = 474; itemDef.modelRotationX = 2045; itemDef.modelOffset1 = 0; itemDef.modelOffset2 = -5; itemDef.anInt165 = 62743; itemDef.anInt200 = 62760; itemDef.groundActions = new String[5]; itemDef.groundActions[2] = "Take"; itemDef.itemActions = new String[5]; itemDef.itemActions[1] = "Wear"; itemDef.itemActions[2] = "Check-charges"; itemDef.itemActions[4] = "Drop"; break;

I want to convert this:

if(i == 9545){ class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5]; class8.aStringArray189[1] = "Wear"; class8.anInt174 = 13088; //inv and drop class8.anInt181 = 1967; class8.anInt190 = 434; class8.anInt198 = 0; class8.anInt204 = 0; class8.anInt169 = 0; class8.anInt194 = -4; class8.anInt165 = 13089; //m wear class8.anInt200 = 13089; //f wear class8.aString170 = "Demon Wind Shuriken"; class8.aByteArray178 = "A razor sharp shuriken weapon.".getBytes(); }

To something like this:

case 13360: itemDef.modelid = 62701; itemDef.name = "Torva platelegs"; itemDef.description = "Torva platelegs."; itemDef.modelZoom = 1740; itemDef.modelRotationY = 474; itemDef.modelRotationX = 2045; itemDef.modelOffset1 = 0; itemDef.modelOffset2 = -5; itemDef.anInt165 = 62743; itemDef.anInt200 = 62760; itemDef.groundActions = new String[5]; itemDef.groundActions[2] = "Take"; itemDef.itemActions = new String[5]; itemDef.itemActions[1] = "Wear"; itemDef.itemActions[2] = "Check-charges"; itemDef.itemActions[4] = "Drop"; break;

Read full topic
